text: Câu lạc bộ bóng đá Công An Nhân Dân, simply known as Công An Nhân Dân, is a professional football club, based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, that plays in the Vietnamese National Football Second League, the third tier of Vietnamese football. == History == On April 7, 2008, Lieutenant General Nguyen Khanh Toan – Permanent Deputy Minister of Public Security (Vietnam) signed Decision No. 375 / QD – BCA (X15) on the establishment of the People's Police Football Team == Current squad == As 29 March 2018 ==Managers== * 2008–2013: Mai Trần Hải * 2013–2014: Nguyễn Đức Thắng * 2014–2015: Phạm Minh Đức * 2015–2017 : Phan Bá Hùng * 2018– : Nguyễn Văn Tuấn == Prizes == *Vietnamese National Football Third League _Runner-up (1): 2008 [8] *Vietnamese National Football Second League _Champion (1): 2014 _1st in Group A: 2017 *Vietnamese National Football First League: 2015 *Football Police League, ASEAN Police: _Champions (1): 2007 [9] _Encourage (1): 2012 [10] == References == ==External links== * * Category:Football clubs in Vietnam
title: CLB Công An Nhân Dân
